medusa.description:
Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/medusa, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
medusa.more_info: Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

8081.description: Port for medusa Web interface. Suggested default: 8081.
8081.label: WebUI port
